description:
In this course, Sue-Tanya will walk you through what you need to do in order to work as a virtual assistant. Sue-Tanya is a well accomplished Virtual Assistant and teaches classes on the topic. She will explain:

  • What working online as a virtual assistant means
  • What skills you need to have and where you can learn new skills for free
  • What websites you can work on that are trusted
  • How you get paid
  • and much more
title: How to Start a Career as a Work at Home Virtual Assistant
